org.springframework.statemachine.transition

Class AbstractTransition<S,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.statemachine.transition.AbstractTransition<S,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type of state
    E - the type of event
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transition<S,E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractExternalTransition, AbstractInternalTransition, AbstractLocalTransition, InitialTransition

    public abstract class AbstractTransition<S,E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transition<S,E>
    Base implementation of a Transition.
    Author:
    Janne Valkealahti
